Wonderful place, had a great time! Highly recommend visiting at least once. Food is amazing too!
Food was great, service was great. Fun atmosphere. Would go back again. Getting in without reservation was easy too, just get there early.

During my recent business trip, I had the pleasure of dining at this remarkable restaurant. From the moment I walked in, I was impressed with the exceptional service provided by the staff. The menu offered a diverse range of delicious dishes that were expertly prepared and presented. The stunning view from the restaurant only added to the overall experience. Additionally, the live music provided a delightful ambiance that made the evening even more enjoyable.Overall, I would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for an outstanding dining experience. The combination of excellent service, delectable cuisine, breathtaking view, and live music make it a must-visit destination. I look forward to returning in the future and enjoying another memorable meal.
Delicious food, wonderful service and great wait staff! The location is perfect! And really awesome setting to get some good food at.

I had a lot of fun with my out of town friend when she came to visit. Great food and a super cute spot! More casual than I expected, but it's never bad to be overdressed. Also introduced me to Wild Roots raspberry vodka! Love that stuff
I love Italian food and this place does not disappoint! I got the pink pasta and the meatballs and they were absolutely delicious! can't wait to come back!
Good food, unique decor and great service. Door wasn't pink, though. More of a tinted beige.
This place sells great food and I love the atmosphere as well. Service could have been faster.
great service and great food. if you want a great and amazing place to eat I recommend coming here
The food was awesome also their services. I loved the Pink Door and the ambience is fantastic, and there are various dining options available from inside near the bar.
Good food Good Service. Best part is the Selfie zone unique decor love it and the staffs are very polite
The must magical place and amazing food. One of my favorite restaurants in Seattle.

We were lucky enough to get a walk in table after this restaurant came highly suggested. Abby was our server and was awesome, she made the best recommendations (GET THE LASAGNA) and was efficient and personable. If you are in the Seattle area, you must go here!

Absolutely amazing! The Pink Door came highly recommended by a friend, and it did not disappoint. The food was beyond delicious, and the service was exceptional. We savored every bite of the Lasagna and Pappardelle Bolognese, both of which were outstanding. If you want the ultimate dining experience, request a table in Adam's section - he truly excels at making your visit special.
Great vibe, good food, good service. Definitely recommend if you are looking for a nice dinner out.

Food was amazing, service was great. They really hold themself to a high standard. It felt like I was in someones dinning room and that really added to the ambiance. Got a great table by the window with a great view of the market.
This place is lovely! Great food, great service, and great atmosphere. Not sure what more you could ask for!

I had an outstanding dining experience at this Italian pasta place! The pasta was cooked to perfection, and the sauces were bursting with flavor. The authenticity of the dishes transported me straight to Italy. The ambiance was cozy and welcoming, making it a great spot for a romantic dinner or a casual meal with friends. The attentive staff provided excellent recommendations, ensuring a memorable dining experience. Highly recommended for pasta enthusiasts!
one of thest food in near you . one of thest food in near you

First of the entrance is so cute. They check your temp at the door. You MUST WEAR A MASK! Father /daughter team here. It was a pleasure able to meet Amber. I purchased a gift card! The card was personalized Super cute.! He went above and put it in a pillow envelope & pink tissue paper. I can't wait to give it to my daughter. This salon specializes in products that are imported from Italy. Very knowledgeable about all products. Super proud dad to know his daughter traveled to perfect her craft. Can't wait to see the magic she will perform on my daughter. Stay tuned.
Wonderful!! Great food, service and location! I loved going in when they had the fortune teller. Great place to meet friends for dinner and drinks after work!
FANTASTIC dinner - everything was top notch and the drinks were amazing! Stefano kept the drinks filled and the food coming. Do not skip this place!

Beautiful restaurant tucked away in an alley near Pike Place Market. Delicious food and beautiful views of the market and Elliot Bay. No signage and reservations are a MUST! Servers are top notch and prices are great!
Fun place, everyone needs to go here at least once in their life.
It's amazing. There's nothing more to say.
great ambiance . unique experience to Seattle .
great setting great food. I will be coming here for dinner again soon
